concept.title: AAFICC PGI 5335.015-70 Special Use Allowances for Research Facilities Acquired by Educational Institutions

li.p: (d)(6) Contracts providing for a special use allowance for the acquisition or construction of research facilities may specify:
(i) Plans, specifications, and major changes thereto shall be subject to approval by the Government; and,
(ii) The work shall be subject to the approval by the Government for conformity to the approved plans and specifications.
